name: Atikur Rahman
title: “I found it so easy to make new friends when I first came to The British School of Guangzhou, students and teachers both made me feel so welcome.”

name: Rohul amin
title: “On my first day at BSG, I was paired up with another girl in my class. She had to show me around and introduce me to other students.”

name: Tamiya akter
title: “The teachers in the school are friendly and the lessons are always interesting and fun.” Year 8

name: Sumaya Begom
title: “My teacher is the best! She plays awesome music to prompt us so that everyone tidy's up on time. She is so fun!” Year 5

name: Rumela Begom
title: “The teachers are constantly encouraging me to do my best. It is great knowing that they are there to help reach my full potential.” Year 10

name: Tonmoy Sorkar
title: “House events are great! Our teachers get dressed up in our house colours and wear funny costumes, which boosts the team spirit. Let’s go Vikings, let’s go!” Year 9
